TopicTitle: Does the game look line-y to anyone else?

Articles.Content:
Everything that isn't ALWAYS there (planets, buildings, stuff like that) is made of lines similar to that on the science lab part. It's obviously not intentional and even appears on the kerbals in the main menu. If anyone has a fix for this, please help! I'm on mac if that has anything to do with it.

 

Here is where a picture was supposed to be if all the screenshots weren't HORRIBLY CORRUPTED. Now I can't even get decent thumbnails!

 

Correction: From space, even Kerbin and the Sun are line-y

Edited October 14, 2016 by Fireheart318
First thought here, check if it's just in KSP or if it happens in other programs and games too.
it's normally stupid way of take screenshot, but picture the monitor with your camera(or smartphone).
Without pictures I can't be sure that this is your problem, but have you turned on anti-aliasing in the settings menu? Without it, the game will appear pixelated.
It's not looking line-y here, we REALLY need to see pics of this, can you put them on imgur for us?
Everything looking weird on the screen AND you can't take screenshots? I suspect your video card.
